name: Pandemic President
description:
You have been elected as the president of a well-known country. Life was heading into a good direction until one fateful incident. A Person from another country ate an exotic animal and contracted themselves with a new unknown virus. First only a few people developed the virus, but viruses are no laughing matter. It spread rapidly and became deadlier by the day. Now it falls onto you, the president of a fine country, to do what you have to do, you must decide the future of your country and the outcome of this pandemic. You must choose the right decisions, You know these decisions could kill all of humanity, so it’s a decision between killing a moderate amount people or only a handful.
